text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga saffordiana is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in Colombia and Panama.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Mitré, M. (1998). "Inga saffordiana". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30607A9564728. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30607A9564728.en. Retrieved 19 December 2017.
